properties.name: front.exposed-docs.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the exposed docs microservice.

properties.name: front.exposed-docs.public-access
properties.description: Allow anonymous access to exposed docs endpoints when security is enabled.

properties.name: front.review-generation.api-base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the back-office API exposing review generation endpoints.

properties.name: front.review-generation.api-key
properties.description: API key forwarded to authenticate against the back-office API.

properties.name: front.review-generation.review-path
properties.description: Path appended to the base URL when triggering or polling review generation.

properties.name: front.review-generation.quota.max-per-ip
properties.description: Maximum number of review generations allowed per IP during the quota window.

properties.name: front.review-generation.quota.window
properties.description: Duration of the quota window used to count review generations per IP.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.enabled
properties.description: Enable the Google Indexing API integration.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.site-base-url
properties.description: Public base URL of the Nuxt frontend used to build canonical product URLs.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.api-endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint used to publish URL notifications.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.service-account-json
properties.description: Service account JSON payload used to authenticate with Google APIs.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.service-account-path
properties.description: Path to a service account JSON file used to authenticate with Google APIs.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of URLs processed per batch execution.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.retry-delay
properties.description: Duration to wait before retrying a failed URL.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts before discarding a URL.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.realtime-enabled
properties.description: Enable immediate processing when a URL is enqueued.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.history-retention
properties.description: Retention window for indexed and failed URL history.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.max-queue-size
properties.description: Maximum queue size before the health indicator reports a degraded status.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.max-success-age
properties.description: Maximum age for the last successful indexing event before health degrades.

properties.name: front.google-indexing.queue-file-name
properties.description: File name used to persist pending queue entries on disk.

properties.name: front.search.suggest.semantic-fallback-enabled
properties.description: Enable semantic fallback for product suggestions when prefix search yields no results.

properties.name: front.semantic-diagnostics-enabled
properties.description: Enable semantic score diagnostics in global search responses.
